籤詩版本二:
Ilangatye elitshisayo lifikelela esibhakabhakeni, kwaye ilotus ikhula emadangatyeni
Ekugqibeleni iya kuphumelela kwaye ayiyi kubangela ingozi, kodwa iya kukhula amagqabi kunye neengcambu.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nelotus ekhula emlilweni.
Yonke into ibonakala iyingozi kodwa ayinabungozi.
解曰: Nangona usengozini. Akukho bungozi emzimbeni wakhe. Ukwenza ubomi. Bonke badibana nabantu abahloniphekileyo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Intlambo yoMlilo
Ngexesha lobuKumkani obuThathu, uLiu Bei kunye noZhou Yu bahlasela iCao Cao ngokudibeneyo. U-Kong Ming wamisela iqonga leenkwenkwezi ezisixhenxe ukunqula umoya wasempuma kwaye wanceda uZhou Yu ukuba atshise iRed Cliff. Umkhosi kaCao Cao watshiswa waza wabaleka ngenxa yokoyika. kananjalo babaleka nomkhosi owoyisiweyo.
Iinjengele zeqela leKongming zazilalela yonke indawo.
UCao Cao waya emlonyeni we-Hulu Valley ukuze aphumle kwaye apheke. Ebona ukuba lo mhlaba uyingozi yaye akukho zilalela, wahleka.
Ngokukhawuleza weva isandi senkanunu kwaye uZhang Fei weza kumbulala.
Kwaqhambuka imililo kuyo yonke indawo entlanjeni, kwaye umkhosi kaCao Cao watsala nzima.UCao Cao wakhwela ihashe lakhe wabaleka ephakuzela emlilweni.
Yoyisa kwaye uye kwi-Huarong Road.
(Nangona esengozini, usenako ukusindisa ubomi bakhe.)
聖意: Ikhaya alikho kwimeko entle.Kulumkele ukufuna ubutyebi, umsebenzi, urhwebo, umtshato wamatshivela, uthintele iLiujia, ukoyikisa abahambi ngeenyawo, amasimi ehinder, iintshulube zesilika zilahlekile, imfuyo emithandathu yonakele, abantu bayalandelwa, amatyala oluntu asentshona alahlekile, imfuduko. uyalondoloza, izinto ezilahlekileyo ziyalahleka, izifo ziyamiswa, zithunyelwe ezintabeni kwaye amangcwaba ayahlaziywa.
